item.title: Cloudflare hit by data breach in Salesloft Drift supply chain attack
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Cloudflare is the latest company impacted in a recent string of Salesloft Drift breaches, part of a supply-chain attack disclosed last week. [...]

item.title: Cloudflare blocks largest recorded DDoS attack peaking at 11.5 Tbps
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Internet infrastructure company Cloudflare said it recently blocked the largest recorded volumetric distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attack, which peaked at 11.5 terabits per second (Tbps). [...]

item.title: No, Google did not warn 2.5 billion Gmail users to reset passwords
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Google has disputed a widely reported story about the company warning all Gmail users to reset their passwords due to a recent data breach that also affected some Workspace accounts. [...]

item.title: Jaguar Land Rover says cyberattack ‘severely disrupted’ production
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) announced that a cyberattack forced the company to shut down certain systems as part of the mitigation effort. [...]

item.title: Pennsylvania AG Office says ransomware attack behind recent outage
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The Office of the Pennsylvania Attorney General announced that a ransomware attack is behind the ongoing two-week service outage. [...]

item.title: Palo Alto Networks data breach exposes customer info, support cases
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: Palo Alto Networks suffered a data breach that exposed customer data and support cases after attackers abused compromised OAuth tokens from the Salesloft Drift breach to access its Salesforce instance. [...]

item.title: Zscaler data breach exposes customer info after Salesloft Drift compromise
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: Cybersecurity company Zscaler warns it suffered a data breach after threat actors gained access to its Salesforce instance and stole customer information, including the contents of support cases. [...]

item.title: Amazon disrupts Russian APT29 hackers targeting Microsoft 365
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Researchers have disrupted an operation attributed to Russian state-sponsored threat group Midnight Blizzard, who sought access to Microsoft 365 accounts and data. [...]

item.title: Brokewell Android malware delivered through fake TradingView ads
item.dc:creator: Ionut Ilascu
item.description: Cybercriminals are abusing Meta's advertising platforms with fake offers of a free TradingView Premium app that spreads the Brokewell malware for Android. [...]

item.title: OpenAI releases big upgrade for ChatGPT Codex for agentic coding
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: OpenAI has announced a big update for Codex, which is the company's agentic coding tool. [...]

item.title: Anthropic is testing GPT Codex-like Claude Code web app
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: Anthropic is planning to bring the famous Claude Code to the web, and it might be similar to ChatGPT Codex, but you'll need GitHub to get started. [...]

item.title: ChatGPT can now create flashcards quiz on any topic
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: If you use ChatGPT to learn new topics, you might want to try its new flashcard-based quiz feature, which can help you evaluate your progress. [...]
